title: Mine to Keep
description: Noelle Steele has terrible luck with men. So terrible, in fact, she’s thinking of giving up dating altogether. Because seriously, who needs a man when you’re working your dream job and just moved into your dream condo? It has the perfect setup, is in the perfect location and even comes with a perfect neighbor. He takes the trash out, helps with dinner, and, is big and brawny the way she likes them. Shoot, he even rubs her feet after work. He’s perfect… Although, there is the issue of that pesky little stalker situation. Jaylen Rivers thought he had a secret admirer. You know, just someone leaving random little love notes on the windshield of his car every now and then. Nothing harmful. So, he sees no issue with pursuing something with his sexy new neighbor Noelle. That is, until the notes start getting angry and the black figure shows up, with increasing anger towards Noelle…
author: AshleyNicole
